+test.dependsOn assemble
+
+copyPiiFiles {
+  include '**/*.properties'
+}
+
+// This task removes the non-tranformed build jar from the build image.
+// The transformed jar remains published.  Remote or disable this task 
+// when modifying this project to build the yasson release artifact 
+// acquired from maven central.
+task retractWLPJars(type: Delete) {
+    dependsOn publishWLPJars
+
+    FileTree tree = fileTree(dir: buildImage.file('wlp/lib'))

timeline.bodyText: Do we have some sort of issue to track enabling all of the skipped tests once cdi-3.0 is available? If we just have this TODO comment in the code I worry that it will be forgotten.
timeline.author: aguibert

replies.bodyText: @aguibert We have an issue to track all remaining work, #11633.  We'll need to modify it slightly once this PR merges in its final state.
replies.author: dazavala

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a comment indicating why this test is being skipped for EE9 features?
timeline.author: aguibert

timeline.bodyText: can you include a comment indicating why these tests are skipped?
timeline.author: aguibert

timeline.bodyText: This implies the transformer tool isn't renaming META-INF/service/javax.* files to their jakarta.*, is there an issue open on the transformer tool to track that?
timeline.author: aguibert

replies.bodyText: Yes.  I opened issue tbitonti/jakartaee-prototype#97 to document and track this problem.
replies.author: dazavala

timeline.message: change copyright year to pass unit test
Enable jakartaee for jsonbContainer and jsonpContainer features
Jakartaee test enablement for jsonb fat
Enable jakarta jsonbProvider service to load the yasson implementation
Added transformation packages for jakarta.ws.rs and jakarta.xml.bind
Added issue url to the comment
change copyright year to pass unit test
